skills.name: Lightning Flash
desc:
Deals Lightning DMG equal to **70%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **30%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **40%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **77%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **33%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **44%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **84%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **36%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **48%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **91%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **39%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **52%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **98%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **42%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **56%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **105%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **45%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **62%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **114%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **49%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **70%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Lightning DMG equal to **123%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **53%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **80%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to **108%** of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Good Night, Belobog
desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% **base chance** for all enemies to become Shocked for 3 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to 50% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

eidolons.name: Echo Chamber
eidolons.desc: Basic ATK deals Lightning DMG equal to 60% of the Basic ATK's DMG to a random enemy adjacent to the target of the Basic ATK.

eidolons.name: Encore!
eidolons.desc: Every time Serval's Talent is triggered to deal Additional DMG, she regenerates 4 Energy.

eidolons.name: Listen, the Heartbeat of the Gears
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Make Some Noise!
eidolons.desc: Ultimate has a 100% base chance to apply Shock to any enemies not currently Shocked. This Shock has the same effects as the one applied by Skill.

eidolons.name: Belobog's Loudest Roar!
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: This Song Rocks to Heaven!
eidolons.desc: Serval deals 30% more DMG to Shocked enemies.

skillTree.name: Rock 'n' Roll
skillTree.desc: Skill has a 20% increased base chance to Shock enemies.

skillTree.name: String Vibration
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

skillTree.name: Mania
skillTree.desc: Upon defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 20% for 2 turn(s).
